title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 336: Bonus Episode Featuring Torrey Mitchell
description:
On Episode 336 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are back for a bonus episode this week, featuring Torrey Mitchell. Big Money Mitch (42:23) joined the show to discuss playing with Jumbo, the crazy JR prank story, his nickname and tons more. The guys open up the podcast wrapping up the Toronto-Montreal series and discuss what is next for Toronto. The boys then dive into the controversy at the end of the Jets-Habs Game 1 and give an update on each of the remaining playoffs series. The guys wrap up the show talking documentaries, the French Open, and their trip to Boston.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
